participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for music and community service.
participant_1.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, with a passion for sports and a strong connection to rural life.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
